Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: The Australian government's proposed budget for 2023 has ignited reactions among netizens. The Women's Economic Equality Taskforce outlined six recommendations to support disadvantaged groups the Reserve Bank of Australia faced criticism for its interest rates policy and a petition to scrap the "fiscally irresponsible" Stage 3 tax cuts has garnered support. With government debt reaching $1 trillion a 3% increase in interest rates would add $30 billion equivalent to the annual cost of the universal healthcare system in Australia to the budget.
